overview: Filmmaker Aiden Riley has developed a unique style of hard-core videography while working as smut legend and lesbian aficionado Belladonna's partner in crime. Aiden's special take on "reality porn" has blossomed into a world of kinky, young alt-girl lovers with a taste for explicit, fetishistic foot play, bizarre toys and dyke perversion, intercut with revealing backstage footage and soul-baring conversation. "Viewer Discretion Is Advised" is the director's new two-disc, six-and-a-half hour showcase of uninhibited, natural play featuring the current favorites in Belladonna Entertainment's troupe of all-natural, Sapphic sluts.
title: Viewer Discretion Is Advised
